name: Bergchalets Klausner - Die Hütte
description:
The unique and cosy chalet from the year 1844 – rebuilt accurately with lots of love is located on a quiet and sunny hill. Relax your body and mind over the stunning view and get away from the daily stress routine – the perfect accomodation for a romantic holiday for two. By the proximity to skiing and hiking area and quiet location in the heart of the magnificent Zillertal Alps, it is the ideal retreat for those seeking tranquility and activity at the same time.

Upside down in the pure nature – with a fantastic view over the valley, large sun terrace, finish sauna, swimming pond, romantic barbeque spots and much more. Even pets are welcome here.

Offside but still in the middle of it – the Zillertal is the flagship of the Tyrolean alpine tourism and one of the finest skiing and snowboarding areas anywhere in Europe You can, in fact, ski all year round on the Hintertux Glacier. There is a ski bus stop in front of the bergchalets-klausner, which is running in the morning and in the afternoon.

The region Mayrhofen-Hippach is famous for it’s excellent gastronomy with Zillertal specialities or international cuisine and top events.

Wood for stove € 3 per 10kg,
Final cleaning € 15 per person (min. € 50 – max. € 90),
Pets € 15 per week per dog,
Sauna € 12 for 90 min
book. charge € 25
Bed linen dish towels, towels, energy, garbage disposal included

You can move into your hut from ca. 15:00 o'clock, on the day of your departure you should leave the hut till 9 o'clock.
The landlady welcome you an explain you everything about the hut.

makesOffer.name: Hut
makesOffer.description:
Set on 48 sqm - stylish wooden furniture with a combination of tradition and discreet luxury, the chalet contains a well equipped kitchen living room with a homely sitting area, a comfortable sofa with a tiled stove and a bathroom with shower and WC. Enjoy the fresh mountain air on the large sun terrace with sun loungers and barbeque. The romantic sleeping area ist situated upstairs - in the morning you will be awakened by the sun and be rewarded with a fantastic view of the Zillertal mountains.
Appartement facilities

- Double bed
- Bedlinen, towels and dishtowels are available
- Satellite-TV
- Radio and high-fi system with CD player
- Free WLAN
- Bathroom with shower, basin, WC, towel radiator and hair dryer
- Seperate WC upstairs
- Floor heating
- Tiled stove
- Kitchen (electric stove, oven, dish washer, coffee machine, water boiler, fridge with freezer)
- Microwave and fondue set on demand
- Balcony
- Sun terrace
- Sunlounger
- Sauna house (finish sauna - for a small charge)
- Ski boot warmer
- Natural swimming pond
- Barbeque area
- Carport (don’t forget the snow chains in winter)
- Ski bus stop in front of the bergchalets klausner
